name: FamilyInspirations
0:
”Alexa, open Family Inspirations”
”Alexa, start Family Inspirations”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: family inspirations
des: Start your day with an inspirational list of quotes. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
